definition: hair/drawing brush/(in the) least/one thousandth/currency unit, 0.1 yuan
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: The experts also said people should take less than4000mg4,000milligrams of acetaminophen in a single day.
sentences.chinese: 專家們認爲一天醋酚氨服用量要少於4000毫克。

sentences.english: Swallow 200 micrograms a day of chromium polynicotinate.
sentences.chinese: 每天吞食200毫克的煙酸鉻。

sentences.english: But collard greens, with about 375 micrograms per half-cup, are among the best.
sentences.chinese: 但甘藍蔬是其中最好的，它每半杯就含有375毫克。

sentences.english: Diamonds are weighed and valued in carats. One carat equals two hundred milligrams .
sentences.chinese: 鑽石的稱量和計價單位是克拉，一克拉相當二百毫克。

sentences.english: Your limit should be 1, 500 milligrams of sodium per day, about theamount in three-fourths of a teaspoon of salt.
sentences.chinese: 你的極限是每天1500毫克鈉，約四分之三茶匙鹽。

sentences.english: Propranolol was given orally in as dose of 80 mg 8-hourly.
sentences.chinese: 口服普萘洛爾，每次80毫克，8小時一次。

sentences.english: Supplement the calcium with 500 mg of magnesium to avoid constipation.
sentences.chinese: 補鈣的同時攝入500毫克鎂能夠防止便祕。

sentences.english: The java junkies typically had at least 300 milligrams of caffeine daily.
sentences.chinese: 這些咖啡控們每天至少攝入300毫克咖啡因。

sentences.english: One cup of turnip greens offers 200 milligrams of calcium.
sentences.chinese: 一杯份的青蘿蔔可提供200毫克的鈣。

sentences.english: As little as 50mg of caffeine can produce pharmacological effects.
sentences.chinese: 僅僅50毫克的咖啡因就能產生藥理效果。

sentences.english: Acceptable Benzene level indoors is 50 mg per sq. ft.
sentences.chinese: 正常室內可允許的苯含量爲每平方英尺50毫克。

sentences.english: Per ml in human serum contains about 18 mg.
sentences.chinese: 在人的每毫升血清中約含18毫克。

sentences.english: In addition, 500 mg paracetamol was given three times daily.
sentences.chinese: 此外，給出了500毫克每日三次撲熱息痛。

sentences.english: For instance, the team found an average of about six milligrams of artificial vanilla per liter of water sampled.
sentences.chinese: 研究小組發現，一升水樣中，平均含有6毫克香草。

sentences.english: The upper tolerance level in humans is about 400 micrograms a day.
sentences.chinese: 人類最大耐受量大約400毫克每天。

sentences.english: Balances of a sensitivity of 50mg or better, with or without weights.
sentences.chinese: 感量爲50毫克或更精密的天平，不論是否帶有砝碼。
